metadata.name: Dimension of soul
metadata.description:
This art represents the Sufi saint that is dancing within himself to seek the purity of soul to find himself before connecting with  God within himself .
Dance with the  chanting   verses of divinity .
To lose myself, to find my lost soul and purity .
Before seeking out god I shall  question my reality .
Within me is  truth somewhere hidden beneath the lies of materiality .
